title: What are the things I should concentrate on in order to do well in physics for isa 1?

comments.body:
Read the subject's textbook, and properly understand what each concept tries to convey. I understand the subject is difficult. But unless there is some amount of determination 'n' smart-work from your side, it will be difficult.   
So, just read the following according to me-

1. Textbook - Mainly Arthur Beiser Book
2. Slides and Notes (optional) \[FYI, I really didn't like the slides much\]
3. Assignments & QB In PESU Academy \[If you've got time left yet\]
Do we get mostly application based questions?
Yes, there'll be, for ex the thought experiment (Gamma-ray)
